00079 QTextDocument* CodeEditorWidget::Document() const

00088 bool CodeEditorWidget::OkToContinue()
00089 {
00090 
00091         QTextDocument* document = codeEditor->document();
00092 
00093         if ( document->isModified () )
00094         {
00095                 int answer = QMessageBox::warning( this, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
00096                                  tr( "The document has been modified.\n"
00097                                      "Do you want to save your changes?"),
00098                                  QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::Default,
00099                                  QMessageBox::No,
00100                                  QMessageBox::Cancel | QMessageBox::Escape );
00101 
00102                 if ( answer == QMessageBox::Yes ) return SaveScript();
00103                 else if ( answer == QMessageBox::Cancel ) return false;
00104         }
00105         return true;
00106 }
00107 
00111 void CodeEditorWidget::OpenScriptFile( QString fileName )
00112 {
00113         if( !OkToContinue() ) return;
00114 
00115         StartDocument( fileName );
00116 
00117 }
00118 
00124 void CodeEditorWidget::NewScriptFile()
00125 {
00126         if( !OkToContinue() ) return;
00127 
00128         QTextDocument* document = codeEditor->document();
00129         document->clear();
00130 
00131         m_currentScritFileName = "";
00132         emit FileOpened( QString( "" ) );
00133 
00134         document->setModified( false );
00135 
00136 }
00137 
00145 void CodeEditorWidget::OpenScriptFile()
00146 {
00147         if( !OkToContinue() ) return;
00148 
00149         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
00150         QString dirName = settings.value( "codeeditorwidget.openDirectory", "." ).toString();
00151 
00152 
00153         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( this,
00154                                        tr( "Open File" ),  dirName,
00155                                        tr( "Tonatiuh script file (*.tnhs)" ) );
00156 
00157         if ( fileName.isEmpty() )       return;
00158 
00159         QFileInfo file( fileName );
00160          settings.setValue( "codeeditorwidget.openDirectory", file.absolutePath() );
00161 
00162         StartDocument( fileName );
00163 
00164 }
00165 
00169 void CodeEditorWidget::Run()
00170 {
00171          emit RunScript();
00172 }

00179 bool CodeEditorWidget::SaveAsScriptFile()
00180 {
00181         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
00182 
00183         QString dirName = settings.value( "codeeditorwidget.saveDirectory", "." ).toString();
00184 
00185 
00186         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this,
00187                                        tr( "Save File" ), dirName,
00188                                        tr( "Tonatiuh script file (*.tnhs)" ) );
00189                 if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return false;
00190 
00191         QFileInfo file( fileName );
00192         settings.setValue( "codeeditorwidget.saveDirectory", file.absolutePath() );
00193 
00194 
00195         return SaveScriptFile( fileName );
00196 
00197 }
00198 
00204 bool CodeEditorWidget::SaveScript()
00205 {
00206         if ( m_currentScritFileName.isEmpty() ) return SaveAsScriptFile();
00207         else return SaveScriptFile( m_currentScritFileName );
00208 }
00209 
00216 bool CodeEditorWidget::SaveScriptFile( const QString& fileName )
00217 {
00218         QTextDocument* document = codeEditor->document();
00219 
00220         QFile scriptFile( fileName );
00221         if( !scriptFile.open( QIODevice::WriteOnly) )
00222         {
00223                 QMessageBox::warning( this, tr( "Tonatiuh warning" ),
00224                                                                           tr( "Cannot open file %1." )
00225                                                                         .arg( fileName ) );
00226                 return false;
00227         }
00228 
00229         QTextStream out( &scriptFile );
00230         out<<document->toPlainText();
00231 
00232         scriptFile.close();
00233         document->setModified( false );
00234 
00235 
00236         m_currentScritFileName = fileName;
00237         emit FileSaved( fileName );
00238         return true;
00239 }

00244 void CodeEditorWidget::UpdateCodeEditorWidth( int /* width*/ )
00245 {
00246         QWidget* viewport = codeEditor->viewport();
00247         viewport->setContentsMargins( lineNumberWidget->LineNumberAreaWidth(), 0, 0, 0 );
00248 }

00253 void CodeEditorWidget::SetupToolbar()
00254 {
00255 
00256         connect( newButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool) ), this, SLOT( NewScriptFile() ) );
00257         connect( openButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool ) ), this, SLOT( OpenScriptFile() ) );
00258         connect( saveButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool ) ), this, SLOT( SaveScript() ) );
00259         connect( saveAsButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool ) ), this, SLOT( SaveAsScriptFile() ) );
00260 
00261         connect( undoButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool ) ), codeEditor, SLOT( undo() ) );
00262         connect( redoButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool ) ), codeEditor, SLOT( redo() ) );
00263 
00264         connect( cutButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool ) ), codeEditor, SLOT( cut() ) );
00265         connect( copyButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool ) ), codeEditor, SLOT( copy() ) );
00266         connect( pasteButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool ) ), codeEditor, SLOT( paste() ) );
00267 
00268         connect( runButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool) ), this, SLOT( Run() ) );
00269 }

00274 void CodeEditorWidget::StartDocument( QString fileName )
00275 {
00276         QFile scriptFile( fileName );
00277         if( !scriptFile.open( QIODevice::ReadOnly) )
00278         {
00279                 QMessageBox::warning( this, tr( "Tonatiuh warning" ),
00280                                                                           tr( "Cannot open file %1." )
00281                                                                         .arg( fileName ) );
00282                 return;
00283         }
00284 
00285         QTextStream in( &scriptFile );
00286 
00287         QTextDocument* document = codeEditor->document();
00288         document->clear();
00289         document->setPlainText( in.readAll() );
00290         scriptFile.close();
00291 
00292         m_currentScritFileName = fileName;
00293         emit FileOpened( fileName );
00294         document->setModified( false );
00295 }
